Detailed Description

StreamingInfo is used to provide and receive information on a streaming operations. It contains the state of the operation, error messages, and device specific error codes. Use this info class for all streaming operations except for read and write operations.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum StreamingInfo::OperationState
 

Enumeration for states of streaming operations.

Enumerator:
OperationCompletedSynchroneously  Operation has been completed synchroneously.
OperationCompleted  Operation has been completed.
OperationNotCompleted  Operation has not been completed so far.
OperationErroneous  Errors have occurred during the operation.
OperationFailed  Operation has failed completely.
OperationNotSupported 
OperationOtherState

BOOLEAN StreamingInfo::IsOperationCompleted (   )  const
 

Tests if the operation has been completed. Is equal to GetOperationsState() == StreamingCompleted.

Returns:
TRUE if operation has been completed, FALSE otherwise.

BOOLEAN StreamingInfo::IsOperationCompletedSynchroneously (   )  const
 

Tests if the operation has been completed synchroneously. Is equal to GetOperationsState() == StreamingCompletedSynchroneously.

Returns:
TRUE if operation has been completed synchroneously, FALSE otherwise.

BOOLEAN StreamingInfo::IsOperationErroneous (   )  const
 

Shows if an error has occurred in the streaming operations . Is equal to GetOperationsState() == StreamingErroneous.

Returns:
TRUE if an error has occurred, FALSE otherwise.

BOOLEAN StreamingInfo::IsOperationFailed (   )  const
 

Shows if the operation has failed and cannot be completed. Is equal to GetOperationsState() == StreamingFailed.

Returns:
TRUE if operation has failed, FALSE otherwise.
